title: JSON Schema for Drush site aliases

root.title: The Drupal root for this site

host.title: The fully-qualified domain name of the remote system hosting the Drupal instance

uri.title: Site URI
uri.description: The value of uri should always be the same as when the site is being accessed from a web browser

user.title: The username to log in as when using ssh or rsync

os.title: The operating system of the remote server

ssh.title: Contains settings used to control how ssh commands are generated when running remote commands

options.title: Additional commandline options for the ssh command itself

tty.title: A flag to force Drush to always or never create a tty

drush-script.title: Path to the remote Drush command

alias-path.title: A list of paths where Drush will search for alias files

service.title: The name of the container to run on
